paper_abstract: Using Szenes formula for multiple Bernoulli series, we explain how to compute Witten series associated to classical Lie algebras. Particular instances of these series compute volumes of moduli spaces of flat bundles over surfaces, and also certain multiple zeta values. (C) 2014 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Multiple Bernoulli series and volumes of moduli spaces of flat bundles over surfaces
